Parameters.Name: RECORDING-2-1-30 START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB

Test.Name: Correct response on GetCapabilities and GetServises
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns GetServicesResponse message

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported RecordingControl: supported Digest: supported

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Correct response. Notification is received at first attempt
Test.Description: Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Incorrect CreateRecordingJobResponse
Test.Description: DUT sends CreateRecordingJobResponse for receiver instead of MediaProfile

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Correct response - notification is received with second attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: GetRecordingJobState: not Active job state
Test.Description: Notification is received at first attempt DUT sends GetRecordingJobState response message with state.state=Active

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 32 - Validate RecordingJobStateInformation State for source with token 'media_profile2' is incorrect: expected Active, actual Idle STEP FAILED

Test.Name: A.16: No notifications

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
